1.name: Cotton Padded Chair Series
1.description: Outdoor leisure chairs with cotton padded material, available in multiple designs
1.fullDescription: The Cotton Padded Chair Series is designed for outdoor leisure scenarios. Made of comfortable cotton padded material, it includes various styles such as dirt-resistant, reinforced, five-speed adjustable, luxury oak, and gathered types to meet different usage needs, suitable for outdoor environments like campsites

specifications.label: Features
specifications.value: Dirt-resistant, Reinforced type, Five-speed adjustable, Luxury type, Gathered type

2.name: Space Chair Series
2.description: Outdoor leisure space chairs, multiple options available
2.fullDescription: The Space Chair Series is a professional outdoor leisure product made of Nature-friendly materials. Designed to be portable and elegant, it provides a comfortable seating experience for outdoor scenarios, with multiple models to meet diverse needs

specifications.label: Features
specifications.value: Camping & Outdoor Use, Moon Chair Design, Space-Saving Storage, Suitable for Fishing & Beach

3.name: Beach Chair Series
3.description: Dual-purpose outdoor recliners with double square tube that can be used as chairs and beds
3.fullDescription: The Dual-purpose Recliner Series (Double Square Tube) is made of Nature-friendly materials, supporting 180° full recline to convert from a recliner to a bed. It includes basic models, upgraded versions, double-layer cotton padded models, mat spliced models, etc. The extra-wide design is more comfortable, suitable for outdoor leisure and rest scenarios

specifications.label: Material Features
specifications.value: Double-layer cotton padding, Mat spliced, Extra-wide double square tube

4.name: Hanging Chair Series
4.description: Outdoor leisure hanging chairs for comfort and relaxation
4.fullDescription: The Hanging Chair Series is made of Nature-friendly materials, designed for outdoor leisure and relaxation. The suspended structure provides a unique seating experience, including multiple models, suitable for outdoor spaces such as courtyards and campsites
